alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:54PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Juneau, Vernon, Adams and Monroe Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 753 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elroy, or 13 miles west of Mauston, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... New Lisbon around 805 PM CDT. Mauston around 810 PM CDT. Necedah around 815 PM CDT. Dellwood around 820 PM CDT. Friendship and Adams around 830 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Johnson Hill, Big Spring, Glendale, Trippville, and Hoffman Corners. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 54 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
